statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1 AND customer_name = 'John'
DELETE FROM customers WHERE total_spent >= 1000 AND customer_age < 30
DELETE FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND customer_id = 200 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM clusters WHERE customer_id = 100 AND cluster_name = 'Cluster A';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01' AND customer_id = 200;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM customer_clusters WHERE cluster_id = 10 AND customer_id = 200 OR cluster_name = 'VIP';
